title: You Will Be Scared Of My T*ts w/ Chelsea Devantez
description:
This week Jessica has a dental mishap but don't worry, the dead tooth LIVES! After an interruption by a husband, the gals discuss how women’s creative time is not valued as much as men's, Jessica's calling as a merchandising phenomenon, how to wear white pants and walking with legend status. Finally, Chelsea Devantez (Celebrity Book Club podcast) joins June to discuss their budding podcast friendship, wearing a bold red lip as a ‘fuck you,’ and of course we get to hear Chelsea’s dog adoption story. Deep Divers remember, we all deserve ice water with lemon.


Check out the Celebrity Book Club podcast and more about Chelsea Devantez on her website:

https://www.chelsearosedevantez.com/celebrity-book-club

Check out Engineer Jordan's music here: JordanDuffyMusic.com  and follow her IG @JordanKDuffy 

Check out all our HOT merch at https://kinshipgoods.com/collections/deep-dive

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod                       

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram                        

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram                      

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com                       

Send us your The Deep Dive theme or any questions you might have to thedeepdive@earwolf.com
